body:
hmm okay we'll investigate further. Maybe with the FindCUDA.cmake that we have, CUDA 9.0 does not get reported correctly and maybe this logic is not executing:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/CMakeLists.txt#L45-L47
